Wednesday 15th October

6pm – 9.30pm

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][image_with_animation image_url=”22188″ image_size=”full” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”Fade In” animation_easing=”default” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1754924407962{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” text_direction=”default”]Masters of Scale is an exclusive gathering for elite Black business owners operating in the six to eight figure range, who are ready to elevate their businesses to unprecedented heights. This event brings together international industry titans, strategic investors, and experts in scaling to share the cutting-edge tactics that allow companies to dominate the market.

Through strategic deep dives, candid discussions, and powerful networking, attendees will learn how to future-proof their business, access lucrative global markets, and prime their operations for profitability. Join an elite community of ambitious business owners who are ready to think bigger, scale smarter, and build companies with a lasting legacy.

Key themes:
1. Future-proof your business in rapidly changing marketplaces by mastering strategic expansions and brand positioning
2. Assess funding models and capital raising strategies to ensure sustainable financing for every stage of business growth
3. Unlock pathways to successfully scale your business into international markets
4. Crack the code on optimised business operations to maximise profitability
5. Understand the systems, strategies, and team dynamics needed to prime your business for multi-million dollar growth

Global Head of Business Partner Diversity, J.P. Morgan[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Thomas Hal Robson-Kanu

Founder & CEO, The Turmeric Co.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Thomas Robson-Kanu is a former Premier League and international footballer who represented clubs such as West Brom and the Wales national team before retiring in 2021 to champion the power of natural nutrition.

In 2018, Thomas and his father founded The Turmeric Co. after discovering the remarkable recovery benefits of their homemade turmeric blend, which helped Thomas overcome injuries and the physical demands of elite training. Since then, The Turmeric Co. has grown into one of the UK’s fastest-growing health brands, with award-winning products loved by thousands across the UK, trusted by professional sports clubs including Everton FC, Brentford FC, and Sale Sharks Rugby Club, and now taking the shelves by storm at Sainsbury’s, Tesco, and Boots.

Thomas’ professional ethos is underpinned by a commitment to excellence, innovation, and integrity. His leadership style is characterised by strategic vision, meticulous attention to detail, and a relentless pursuit of excellence in all endeavours.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” text_direction=”default”]

Lamar Tyler

Co-Founder, Traffic Sales and Profit[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Lamar Tyler is the CEO and co-founder of Traffic Sales & Profit (TSP) – one of the fastest-growing private companies 

in America recognized four consecutive years by Inc. magazine on its annual Inc. 5000 list. TSP is America’s premier learning community of over 47K purpose-driven African American businesses and entrepreneurs, Lamar created his platform alongside his wife, Ronnie Tyler, to not only help guide Black businesses and families to discover their true purpose and legacy, but to also change the economic landscape of the Black community by closing the wealth gap through entrepreneurship. 

Lamar is one of the leading influential voices in business and digital marketing and has gained countless recognition for his work, including being listed as one of Ebony Magazine’s Power 100 as well as receiving the ClickFunnels Two Comma Club X Award, the ClickFunnels Bootstrapped Entrepreneur of the Year Award for Coaching & Consulting (2023), and Black Enterprise Magazine’s 2023 Disruptor of the Year Award.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Kubi Springer

Global Marketing Director x Head of AUTHORITY, AVANTGARDE[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

With 26 years of brand marketing experience, Kubi Springer joined AVANTGARDE Dubai from London in 2022 as Brand Marketing Director for the MEA region and became Global Marketing Director in 2024, overseeing marketing teams across 13 international offices including London, Dubai, Singapore, and Shanghai. In this capacity, Kubi has executed global marketing campaigns for the likes of L’Oréal Paris, FENDI, Dune London, Charlotte Tilbury, and the tourism retail divisions of Abu Dhabi and Dubai.

From the success of her role as Global Marketing Director, Kubi is now heading up AUTHORITY by AVANTGARDE, a cultural marketing agency designed to help brands go global by tapping into authentic cultural narratives and audience insights.

Prior to this, having lived and worked in London and New York, Kubi worked with clients including Nike, TikTok, Beyoncé, MTV, Justin Timberlake, Rio Ferdinand, Rolls-Royce Motor Cars, and Aston Martin. In 2023, she was shortlisted for the ‘Marketer of the Year Award’ by Performance Marketing Weekly.

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” text_direction=”default”]

Keisha Silvera

Export Finance Manager, UK Export Finance[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Keisha engages with companies and business individuals from start-ups to large corporates to help them achieve growth through international trade. Before joining UKEF in July 2021, Keisha spent seven years at NatWest, holding various roles across trade finance, international cash management, business consultancy and business banking. She has a keen focus on getting the best results for her clients and has an extensive professional network across the public and private sector.

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” text_direction=”default”]

Tanyaradzwa Kasinganeti

Corporate Banker, Lloyds Bank[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Tanyaradzwa Kasinganeti is a Banker at Lloyds Bank within the Corporate and Institutional Banking division, where her team specialises in international trade, cash management, and cross-border payment solutions. She works closely with clients in the Consumer & Technology, Media, and Telecom sectors, helping them navigate complex transactional needs and unlock growth through strategic financial tools.

Coming from a family of small and medium-sized business owners in both the UK and Southern Africa, Tanyaradzwa brings a personal understanding of entrepreneurial ambition and the challenges of scaling responsibly. She is passionate about educating business leaders on how finance can be a catalyst for growth, and actively promotes ESG-linked financing as a tool for building resilient, legacy-driven enterprises.

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” text_direction=”default”]

Mark Maciver

Founder, SliderCuts[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Mark Maciver, aka SliderCuts, has been a professional barber since 2003, gaining a renowned client list including LeBron James, Anthony Joshua, Reggie Yates, and UK rappers Stormzy and Tinie Tempah. With over 198k Instagram followers and 45k YouTube subscribers, Mark has become a globally recognised figure in the barbering world, winning numerous awards.

Mark’s brand, SliderCuts, has expanded beyond barbering, with features in campaigns for Nike and Facebook, as well as in GQ and Time Out. He opened SliderCuts Studios in East London in 2018, will soon be launching a product line, and released his debut book, Shaping Up Culture, in 2019. Mark continues to inspire and mentor small businesses and the next generation with his knowledge and drive.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ Jay Cameron

CEO & Founder, Maximum Impact Travel[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” custom_height=”20″][vc_row_inner Dr. Erica Jordan-Thomas

CEO & Founder, 7-Figure Educator[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Dr. Erica Jordan-Thomas is the CEO & Founder of 7-Figure Educator™, a business development company dedicated to shifting power in education and disrupting the racial wealth gap. She has worked with over 20,000 educators nationwide to build, grow, and scale their consulting businesses. On average, her clients earn $92,000 annually — 42% more than the average teacher’s salary of $65,000 — proving what’s possible beyond the classroom.

A former teacher and principal, Erica earned her doctorate in education leadership from Harvard Graduate School of Education. She is the forthcoming author of 7-Figure Educator®, to be published by Hay House in June 2026, and also leads Emma & Easter Realty Group, her real estate investment company.

Tayo Adebisi

Founder & CEO, Tilz Prosperitas Limited[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Tayo Adebisi is the Founder & CEO of Tilz, a fast-growing multinational e-commerce company. She launched on Amazon in 2018 and scaled into a multi-million-pound business. She has featured in media outlets like The Mirror, Business Live, and The Yorkshire Evening Post.

Under her leadership, Tilz now runs six private-label brands across gourmet gifting, homeware, and lifestyle, with a global presence in the UK, Europe, the USA, and Australia. Beyond retail, Tayo also drives e-commerce consultancy and international trade services, helping manufacturers worldwide expand through Amazon, eBay, and Shopify. Her journey showcases the power of vision, resilience, and innovation in building brands for a global market.

Crystal Swain-Bates

Award-Winning Children’s Book Author & Owner, Goldest Karat Publishing[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Crystal Swain-Bates is an award-winning author, entrepreneur, and founder of Goldest Karat Publishing. Recognising the critical lack of representation in children’s literature, she set out to change the narrative, and has since sold more than 750,000 copies of her books worldwide.

Her groundbreaking work has been featured by Forbes, CNN, Essence, BET, and Amazon, and highlighted on Shaquille O’Neal’s TV show Game Plan. Recognized as a trailblazer in diverse children’s publishing, Crystal is also a strategic publishing consultant who helps authors transform their books into powerful platforms for visibility, impact, and income.

Justice Williams

Co-Founder & Editor in Chief, Black Business Magazine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Justice Williams MBE is a personal branding expert, business strategist, and award-winning entrepreneur dedicated to helping women turn their expertise into profit. As the founder of Black Business Magazine and Elevate, her premium membership for female entrepreneurs, she has built a platform that empowers women to grow profitable and purpose-driven brands. She is the Vice Chair of the Greater Birmingham Chamber of Commerce, Black Business Collective.

Justice is also the founder of TEDxLadywood Women and the host of the Dream Plan Launch podcast, where she shares insights on personal branding, business, and mindset. As the co-founder of two kids, Justice balances entrepreneurship with motherhood, championing financial empowerment and opportunities for women.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” Christina Okorocha

Co-Founder & Entertainment Director, VAMP[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Christina is an entrepreneur and has a strong background in building impactful brand collaborations. She brings both strategic insight and a deep understanding of digital culture. Beyond her work at VAMP, Christina is passionate about career development and expanding access to opportunity, particularly for Black entrepreneurs and young people from underprivileged backgrounds who may not see certain career paths as accessible. She is committed to breaking down barriers and supporting small businesses and charities. Christina is an ambassador for the Mayor Fund for London and sits on charity boards.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” Leonard Fom

Founder, FinOps Squad[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Leonard is a seasoned executive with over two decades of global experience, spanning over 5 continents, in finance and leadership having worked with major global multi-nationals. He is a serial entrepreneur and investor, bringing a wealth of experience and insight to any business endeavours. He is the founder of a fractional CFO agency that helps businesses improve their profit margins, scale sustainably and leverage M&A Expertise. Known for his human-centric leadership, his focus is not just about managing resources, but enabling businesses to thrive by crafting bespoke financial strategies tailored to their unique challenges and goals. Personally, Leonard has overcome some of life’s biggest setbacks, including homelessness, discrimination, physical injury, trauma, and depression. Despite these challenges, he has used his resilience, adaptability, and entrepreneurial determination to propel his business forward.
